NOTE Knowledge assets include system elements or their representations (e.g., reusable code libraries, reference architectures) architecture or design elements (e.g., architecture or design patterns), processes, criteria, or other technical information (e.g., training materials) related to domain knowledge, and lessons learned. 3) Share knowledge assets across the organization.
